column2: mod.q <- lm(Volume ~ Girth + I(Girth^2) + Height + I(Height^2), data=trees)

lm(formula = Volume ~ Girth + I(Girth^2) + Height + I(Height^2), 
    data = trees)
mod.q <- lm(Volume ~ poly(Girth, 2, raw=TRUE) + poly(Height, 2, raw=TRUE), data=trees)

lm(formula = Volume ~ poly(Girth, 2, raw = TRUE) + poly(Height, 
    2, raw = TRUE), data = trees)
